mapper.select: select et.eval_status as evalstatus, rp.task_name as taskname, rp.rnd_institution as rndinstitution, (SELECT name FROM member WHERE mem_no = rp.mem_no) AS rndname,ec.eval_started_at as evalstartedat, ec.eval_closed_at as evalclosedat from eval_task et inner join rnd_plan rp on et.rnd_plan_no = rp.rnd_plan_no inner join evaluation_member emem on emem.mem_no = et.mem_no inner join eval_committee ec on ec.eval_committee_no = emem.eval_committee_no where rp.rnd_plan_no = #{rndPlanNo}

select ec.name as evalname, (SELECT name FROM member WHERE mem_no = emem.mem_no) as evalpeople from eval_task et inner join rnd_plan rp on et.rnd_plan_no = rp.rnd_plan_no inner join evaluation_member emem on emem.mem_no = et.mem_no inner join eval_committee ec on ec.eval_committee_no = emem.eval_committee_no where rp.rnd_plan_no = #{rndPlanNo}

select opinion_no as opinionno, mem_no as memno, content as content, created_at as createdat, readhit as readhit, ref as ref, step as step, depth as depth, del_info as delinfo, deleted_at as deletedat, eval_committee_no as evalcommitteeno, rnd_plan_no as rndplanno, bucket_no as bucketno from opinion order by ref desc, step asc

select opinion_no as opinionno, mem_no as memno, content as content, created_at as createdat, readhit as readhit, ref as ref, step as step, depth as depth, del_info as delinfo, deleted_at as deletedat, eval_committee_no as evalcommitteeno, rnd_plan_no as rndplanno, bucket_no as bucketno from opinion where opinion_no = #{opinionNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opinion (opinion_no, mem_no, content, created_at, readhit, ref, step, depth, del_info, deleted_at, eval_committee_no, rnd_plan_no, bucket_no) values (seq_opinion.nextval, #{memNo}, #{content}, DEFAULT, 0, #{ref}, #{step}, #{depth}, 0, DEFAULT, #{evalCommitteeNo}, #{rndPlanNo}, #{bucketNo})
